description:
The TCA9548A is an 8-channel, bidirectional translating I2C switch. The master SCL/SDA signal pair is directed to eight channels of slave devices, SC0/SD0-SC7/SD7. Any individual downstream channel can be selected as well as any combination of the eight channels. This library provides the ability to manage channels on the TCA9548A multiplexer.

v 1.1 - 27 Jan 2020
    - Removed other library dependencies
    - Added triggers to all patches
    - Added open all channels and close all channels patches
    - Changed ACT pin default to 'True'

V1.0 - Initial release.
name: tca9548a

H17XipVqbL.description: I2C address of the multiplexer. Default: 70h
H17XipVqbL.label: ADDR

SJHmj64cbI.description: Pulses when the TCA9548 channel has been opened.
SJHmj64cbI.label: DONE

rJZQsTV5b8.description: A boolean value which enables update actions when the inputs change. Update this input from False to True to force an update without input data changes.
rJZQsTV5b8.label: ACT

rkVmop49WL.description: Triggers action to close all channels.
rkVmop49WL.label: UPD

@/close-channel.description: Closes the specified channel on the multiplexer.

B1fNSTqL-L.description: I2C address of the multiplexer. Default: 70h
B1fNSTqL-L.label: ADDR

HkNH69I-U.description: Channel [0-7] to close on the multiplexer.
HkNH69I-U.label: CHAN

SyYt_N5bL.description: Triggers action to close the specified channels.
SyYt_N5bL.label: UPD

r1-oR5UbL.description: Pulses when the channel is closed on the multiplexer.
r1-oR5UbL.label: DONE

rJaQ2MFbI.description: A boolean value which enables update actions when the inputs change. Update this input from False to True to force an update without input data changes.
rJaQ2MFbI.label: ACT

HJeRalrqbU.description: A boolean value which enables update actions when the inputs change. Update this input from False to True to force an update without input data changes.
HJeRalrqbU.label: ACT

@/is-channel-open.description: Returns a boolean value indicating if the specified channel is open on the multiplexer.

BkCP0vSZ8.description: Channel [0-7] to check for open state on the multiplexer.
BkCP0vSZ8.label: CHAN

HJx0vAwBZI.description: I2C address of the multiplexer. Default: 70h
HJx0vAwBZI.label: ADDR

rybkafFW8.description: A boolean value which enables update actions when the inputs change. Update this input from False to True to force an update without input data changes.
rybkafFW8.label: ACT

ryi3RPrZU.description: Returns true is the specified channel is open; otherwise false.

SJgrLZV5WI.description: A boolean value which enables update actions when the inputs change. Update this input from False to True to force an update without input data changes.
SJgrLZV5WI.label: ACT

SkYBUZ4cW8.description: I2C address of the multiplexer. Default: 70h
SkYBUZ4cW8.label: ADDR

Sy9S8ZE5-8.description: Triggers action to open all channels.
Sy9S8ZE5-8.label: UPD

rJDH8WE9-L.description: Pulses when the TCA9548 channel has been opened.
rJDH8WE9-L.label: DONE

@/open-channel.description: Opens the specified channel on the multiplexer and closes any other open channels.

B1v6iGYWU.description: A boolean value which enables update actions when the inputs change. Update this input from False to True to force an update without input data changes.
B1v6iGYWU.label: ACT

BJq6qUH-I.description: Channel [0-7] to open on the multiplexer.
BJq6qUH-I.label: CHAN

HyS8tw9W8.description: Triggers action to open the specified  channel.
HyS8tw9W8.label: UPD

SkzbsLrbU.description: Pulses when the TCA9548 channel has been opened.
SkzbsLrbU.label: DONE

rkDkoIH-8.description: I2C address of the multiplexer. Default: 70h
rkDkoIH-8.label: ADDR

@/open-multi-channel.description: Opens the specified channel on the multiplexer but does not close any other open channels. Allows multiple channels to be open simultaneously.

BJkiCGtZL.description: A boolean value which enables update actions when the inputs change. Update this input from False to True to force an update without input data changes.
BJkiCGtZL.label: ACT

HyGXTQ9-L.description: Triggers action to open the specified  channel.

S1EdWeFZL.description: I2C address of the multiplexer. Default: 70h
